text: rajanee kee shaadee thee aaj
devaveena nahin aae
haan dev ne jidd karake amit ko maan ke saath bhej diya tha
amit aur maan ko akele aae dekhakar nirmala ke aankhon kee chamak door ho gaee
lekin shaadee ke vaataavaran ko bojhil na hone dene kee sochakar vah krshna se gale milee
pyaar se use bithaaya aur dheeme se bolee bahan jee veena ko bhee saath le aate to kitana achchha hota
krshna jaise taiyaar thee bolee maine to bahut kaha
dev ne bhee jor diya lekin vah to na jaane kis mittee kee banee hai apane nirnay se talatee nahin
yahee bolee dev ke bina kaheen nahin jaoongee
rajanee shaadee ke baad mujhe dillee milakar hee jaegee
itana hee sunakar nirmala kee aankhen bhar aaee ruk na sakee aviral dhaara aur bolee kitane aramaanon se byaah kiya tha bahan jee hamane
kya museebat likhee thee hamaaree betee ke bhaagy mein
tab krshna ne apanee kahee hamane bhee nahin socha tha bahan jee ki aisa bhee ho sakata hai
mera javaan beta shaadee ke baad kuchh din hee khushee mana saka
krshna kee baat sunakar thes lagee nirmala ke man ko
samajhadaar thee kaaboo pa liya apane bhaavon par

lekin suneeta jo vaheen aa chukee thee rok nahin paee krshna ke shabd sunakar apane aavesh ko bolee aisa kyon kahatee hain aantee ki shaadee ke baad kuchh hua shaadee se pahale kya tha dev ko aap logon ne hamen kuchh nahin bataaya
sab chhipa liya
aaj aap kah rahe hain ki shaadee ke baad dev bistar par pad gae
jaise dosh unaka nahin unakee gandee beemaaree ka nahin sirph veena ka hai
aavesh mein rone lagee suneeta lekin chup nahin huee meree pyaareesee bahan kee to jindagee barabaad ho gaee
kya sukh paaya usane kya sukh diya use dev ne nars banakar rah gaee nars
paise vaale the aap log to kisee nars ko hee rakh lete kya padee thee dev ko byaahane kee
suneeta kee baat sunakar sab stabdh rah gae
krshna va nirmala donon kee aankhe nam ho aaee
suneeta kuchh aur bhee bolatee ki prem tejee se bheetar aa gaya
chhota tha lekin raub tha poora sab par
suneeta ke munh par haath rakhakar use chup karaate hue bola kya bole ja rahee ho deedee kuchh to socho
ghar mehamaanon se bhara hai
sab kya kahenge aur aantee ko kuchh kahane ka tumhaara matalab bhee nahin main jaanata hoon unaka koee dosh nahin hai
tab vah krshna ke aamukh hokar haath jodata hua bola aantee main deedee kee taraph se maaphee maangata hoon
aap unakee baaton ko dil se nikaal den
ve aavesh mein na jaane kyaakya bol gaeen
aur yah kahakar vah krshna ke pairon par jhuk gaya
tab krshna prem ko gale lagaate hue bolee mere man mein kuchh hota to main yahaan aatee bhala dosh mera hai ya mere kisee aur ka yah sochane kee shakti nahin hai mere paas
meree aankhon ke saamane mera javaan beta tilatil kar saans le raha hai main kaise sah rahee hoon is gam ko yah mere man se poochho
vah rone lagee thee meree bahoo mere bete kee seva kar rahee hai isamen meree koee jabaradastee to nahin
main unake mangal kee to kaamana karatee hoon har dam
tab tak nirmala bhee sambhal chukee thee bolee hamase galatee ho gaee bahanajee jo yah baat chal nikalee
ab aap sab bhool kar aaraam keejie
shaam ko shaadee hai
meree aapase praarthana hai aap prasann man se rajanee ko aasheervaad deejie
vaataavaran bojhil hua dekar amit jad ho gaya tha
kuchh bolate nahin ban raha tha usase
prem ne bhee mahasoos kiya aur amit se bola aur amit kaise ho
main theek hoon bilkul
muskuraane kee cheshta karate hue bola mere yogy kuchh kaam ho to batao
kaam sab ho gaya aao tumhen apane mitron se milavaoon
aur usakee baanh thaame prem kamare se baahar nikalate hue nirmala se bola amma jee ab aap aantee ko rajanee ke paas le jao aur inake jalapaan ka prabandh karo
usake shabdon mein mook aadesh tha pyaar bhara
amit kee aankhen shaadee kee raunak mein priya ko khoj rahee thee
prateeksha adhik na karanee padee use
priya dikh gaee use
apanee ek sakhee ke saath khadee thee
amit kee or dekhakar vah muskuraee
amit ke kadam svatah usakee or badh gae
hailo priya kaisee ho amit ne muskuraate hue kaha
vah bhee muskuraatee huee dekhane lagee usakee or
main achchhee hoon
aap kaise hain
tab priya ne usaka parichay apanee sakhee se karavaaya
sulochana tha naam usaka
phir amit se poochha usane veena deedee kaisee hain aap unhen bhee le aate
amit ka svar dab gaya maine to kaha tha unase lekin
baat adhooree hee chhod dee usane
aur dev jeeja jee
tab priya ne baat samajhakar aage badhaee
bas unhee kee chinta hai
bahut man hai unhen dekhane ka
agar kaalej se chhuttee ho to mere saath chalana mil lena unase deedee se
amit ne use nimannan diya
tabhee kisee ne sulochana ko pukaara
vah unake nikat se hat gaee donon akele rah gae
mammee nahin jaane dengee abhee
priya udaasasee hotee dikhaee dee amit ko
amit samajha baat ka rukh badala usane bhaabhee bahut taareeph karatee hai aapakee
achchha
mujhe pyaar bhee sabase adhik karatee hain
priya bhee muskuraee saath hee bolee vaise aapakee baaten har patr mein jarur likhatee hain
bahut prabhaavit hain aapase
achchha mujhe to kabhee nahin bataaya apanee prashansa se prasann hua amit
kuchh aur baaten kee unhonne aur avasar paakar amit ne kaha priya se main aapake lie ek cheej laaya hoon parsanal
mere lie mere lie kyon aashchary chakit huee priya
lekin man hee man prasann ho uthee
kyonki vah aur kisee ko nahin de sakata
itana kah kar amit ke kaan laal ho gae the
aisa bhee kya hai dekhoon jara kautoohalavash poochha priya ne
koee cheej nahin hai kuchh aur hai
chand kaagaj ke tukaden
pahelee bujhaee amit ne
pahalee mulaakaat mein itanee jaldee khulane se dar bhee raha tha vah
kaagaj ke tukade un par kuchh to hoga priya bilkul bholepan se poochh rahee thee
kal subah de doonga
aaraam se dekh lena
kaaphee samay lagega samajhane mein
amit muskura raha tha
aisa bhee kya hai abhee dikhaeee
priya kee jigyaasa bhee badh gaee thee
kuchh samajh rahee thee
kuchh samajhane kee cheshta kar rahee thee
man hee man khush bhee ho rahee thee
jarur doonga
haan ek vaayada karana hoga achchha na lage to chupachaap phenk dena
kisee ko bataana nahin

vaayada to main karungee nahin kyonki main koee baat kisee se chhipaatee nahin priya to muskura rahee thee aapane mere janmadin par badhaee sandesh bheja tha maine to sab ko padhaaya aur haan jaise use yaad aaya usaka shukriya
vah maine sambhaal kar rakha hai abhee tak
achchha
amit yahee sunana chaahata tha bas phir aasha hai aap use bhee sambhaal kar rakhengee
phir svayan hee aashvast hokar bola chaaho bata dena sabako
baat itanee hee kar paaye vah
priya rajanee ke paas chalee gaee aur amit ek kursee par baithakar muskuraata hua kuchh sochane laga
abhee thodee hee der beetee thee ki sulochana aa gaee amit ke paas
ekaek amit ko vishvaas nahin hua usakee baat sunakar bolee vah suna hai aap priya ke lie koee upahaar lae hain
amit sakapaka gaya ekaek
bola main
aapako kisane kah diya aisa
samajha amit kee khinchaee shuru ho gaee
bola main to majaak kar raha tha
achchha aap majaak bahut badhiya tareeke se karate hain
sulochana bhee taiyaar thee
amit ne dekha idharudhar koee nahin sun raha tha unakee baaten
majaak hee to kar raha tha dekh raha tha ki priya kitana sanjeeda hokar letee hai majaak ko
amit ne muskuraate hue kaha
achchha
aapane majaak mein hee use janmadin par kaard bheja tha aur ab majaak mein hee upahaar de rahe hai
sulochana ne kaha
tab amit ne baat badalane kee cheshta kee lekin kamaal kee hai priya
ek minat mein pooree riport de dee aapako
are aap kya samajhate hain ham subah se shaam tak saathasaath rahate hain
tab amit ne hathiyaar daal diye
bola darasal main dekhana chaah raha tha
aapake haavabhaav ko samajhana chaah raha tha aap to badee khushadil hain
ab aap mujh par dore na daalie ek bahut hai
ek kaun vah phir anjaan bana
lo ab mujhe kheenchane lage
ek baat dhyaan rakhie meree ijaajat ke bina aapakee daal nahin gal sakatee
sulochana ne kaha
amit samajh gaya vah achchhee ladakee hai man kee saaph
jaisee priya kee kalpana kee thee usane bilkul vaisee hee
tab bola vah use dheere se upahaar kuchh nahin bas mai apanee bhaavanaen samet kar laaya hoon
sulochana bhee usee ton mein bolee kaisee bhaavanaen
tumhen de doonga pahuncha dena us tak amit ne utar diya
baat itanee hee ho paee unake beech
mehamaan aane shuru ho chuke the
aur tab sulochana uthakar bheetar chalee gaee
amit kee daayaree ke har panne par naam tha priya ka
priya ke naam dherasee meetheemeethee pyaaree kalpanaon ka chitran tha
daayaree ka har shabd priya ke lie ek sukhad anubhooti lie tha
aisa lag raha tha priya ko ki amit khada ho jaise usake aasapaas kaheen aur pukaar raha ho use
har akshar priya ke lie tha
ab priya ko aur kuchh yaad nahin tha bas amitamit usee ka naam usee kee baaten usee kee kalpana
maan ne suna pahale sunatee tab achchha lagata
lekin ab vah dar gaee
naheennaheen
pagalee na bano usake lie
ek bahan gaee us ghar mein sab kuchh ulat gaya
kitana bada dhokha hua hai
bhool sakatee ho kya vah sab maan ke svar mein aadesh tha amit ko bhool jaane ka
nahin mammee nahin usamen amit ka kya dosh tab geeta ne priya ka saath dete hue kaha
usaka dosh kuchh nahin bas keval itana hai ki vah dev ka bhaee hai usee parivaar ka hai jahaan hamaaree betee duhkh bhog rahee hai
maan ne kaha
lekin amit achchha ladaka hai bahut achchha
dev jeeja jee ka dosh usake parivaar vaalon ka dosh us par madhana achchha nahin
geeta ko priya ke lie amit man se bha gaya tha
vah apanee bahan kee taraphadaaree kar rahee thee
nirmala ne tab aadeshaatmak svar mein baat samaapt karate hue kaha main kuchh nahin jaanatee bas jo kah diya us par amal karo
use apane man se nikaal do aur apanee padhaee mein dhyaan do
priya kuchh kahana chahatee thee lekin geeta ne ishaare se use chup rahane ko kaha
nirmala chalee gaee tab geeta bolee tum chinta na karo
maan maan jaegee kyoki amit achchha ladaka hai
nahin maanegee maan dekhatee nahin kitanee kaduvaahat hai unake man mein usake parivaar vaalon ke prati
priya bhaavuk ho chukee thee
vah apanee jagah theek hain lekin samay rahate sab theek ho jaega
tum amit ko do shabd likh to do
priya kee bhaavanaon kee pooree pakad thee geeta ko
chhotee hote hue bhee usakee paramamin thee
jaanatee thee priya bahut bhaavuk hai bhaavanaon ke aavesh mein kuchh bhee kar sakatee hai
amit jo kabhee ajanabee tha priya ke lie aaj use apana sabase priy lag raha tha
usee ko apane man kee baat likh sakatee thee aisa lag raha tha aur likhane baith gaee
amit ke naam aaye priya ke patr ko dekhakar veena palabhar mein sab samajh gaee
ek nahin do nahin rojaroj patr aane lage
amit bhee likhata hoga
man mein vah khush ho gaee
usaka man kitana komal tha veena ka hraday kitana saral tha man mein koee gaanth nahin thee
jaanatee thee usake parivaar vaale bahut duhkhee the lekin use laga tha kitana vyarth duhkh hai unaka
use dev achchha lagata tha use amit apane bhaeesa priy tha use apane sabhee sasuraal vaale apane lagate the
tabhee jab usane dekha amit va priya ekadoosare ko chaahane lage hain to vah bahut khush huee
dev se bolee amitapriya kee jodee achchhee rahegee
mujhe bahut sahaara rahega priya ka
dev to chaahata tha pahale hee din se
lekin ab sthiti badalee huee mahasoos ho rahee thee
man se jaanata tha veena ke gharavaale rishte ko nahin maanenge
iseelie apanee raay dene se katara raha tha
chup raha veena kee baat sunakar bas muskura bhar diya
tab veena hee bolee kya main likhoon mammee ko
mammee nahin maanengee aisa mujhe lagata hai
dev ne kaha
tab apane dil kee baat
kyon nahin maanengee amit jaisa ladaka kahaan milega aur phir donon ekadoosare ko ab chaahane bhee lage hain
priya ke patr ab lagabhag roj aate hain amit ke naam aur amit bhee dinaraat usee ko likhata rahata hai
veena ne is rishte ko sveekrti de dee thee
sabase oopar use ab amitapriya ka saath lag raha tha
itana sab ek saath vah kaise kar letee hai dev sochakar aashcharyachakit tha
ek hee ghar mein ek bahan usake saath duhkh bhog rahee hai aur vahee bahan apanee chhotee bahan ke lie usee ghar mein sukh dekh rahee thee
tumhaaree baat theek hai lekin jab rishte kee baat aaegee sabhee na kar denge
suna nahin suneeta kis kadar naaraaj hai ham sabase
dev ne kaha
suneeta ko samajhaaya ja sakata hai
lekin mujhe apane mammeedaidee par bharosa hai ve man mein koee bair nahin paal sakate kabhee kisee ke lie
yah theek hai unhen mere prati bahut duhkh hai
tumhaaree beemaaree kee unhen chinta hai
lekin priya aur amit ke rishte ke lie mereetumhaaree sthiti ko saath nahin milaenge
phir amit ko mainne dekha hai samajha hai use
ve bhee use achchhee tarah jaanate hain
usamen koee kamee nahin
priya usake saath bahut sukhee rahegee
veena ne apanee baat par drdh rahate hue kaha
theek hai tum mammee ko patr likh kar dekh lo
mujhe to vaastav mein bahut achchha lagega
dev ne apane man kee baat kah dee
man mein ek baat thee usake ki veena ko priya ka saath mil gaya to vah bhee khush rah paegee
tab veena maan ko patr likhane baith gaee
nirmala ne padha veena ka patr
amit ke prati veena kee likhee baaten padhakar use amit par pyaar aa raha tha lekin kuchh nirnay karate usake man mein jhijhak ho rahee thee
jis ladakee ke lie usake man mein usake sasuraal vaalon ke prati rosh tha vahee unhee kee pranshasa kar rahee thee
pannaalaal ghar aae to unake saamane usane veena ka patr rakh diya
patr padhakar pannaalaal ne nirmala se poochha tumhaaree kya raay hai
main kya kahoon mujhe te yah ladakee pagala gaee lagatee hai
nirmala ko pannaalaal ne rok diya usake duhkh mein sukh hamen nahin use bhee nahin haan apana duhkh vah kisee se baantana nahin chaahatee
apane duhkh ka dosh vah kisee ko nahin detee
aur duhkhasukh mein bhed bhee jaanatee hai tabhee to amit ke lie pranshasa karatee hai
pannaalaal ke vichaar shaayad veena se mel khaate the
sahaj bhaav se apanee baat kah gaya vah
amit mujhe bhee achchha lagata hai priya ka man bhee usee mein hai
lekin duniyaavaale hansenge ham par
sach ko kaun jaanega sab yahee kahenge na jaane kis laalach mein ek ko pahale hee aag mein jhonk diya ab doosaree ko bhee vaheen daal rahe hai
nirmala ne apanee baat kahee
duniya vaalon ka kya duniya vaale khade tamaasha dekhate hai
kaun kisaka kitana saath deta hai saaree umr beet gaee yahee dekhate hue
pannaalaal ne apanee baat kaheen
yaani use veena ka prastaav manjoor tha
bole ja rahe the pahale jo hua dekhe bina jaldee mein kar diya
ham nahin jaanate the unako
ab ye ladaka to dekhaabhaala hai
ise to koee beemaaree nahin
padhaalikha apane pairon par khada hai
sach kaho to usee ke boote par veena kee mujhe chinta nahin
aisa ladaka to nahin milega
phir kaheen akhabaar mein chhaapege kaun aaega
nahin pata
baakee tum dekh lo
poochh lo suneeta se patr likhakar
pannaalaal ne saaree baat ek saath kah dee
suneeta kee baat to mujhase huee thee
use amit se gila nahin lekin usake parivaar vaalon ke naam se chidh hai
nirmala ne kaha
tab meree maano to haan kah do
mujhe man se amit bahut achchha lagata hai
pannaalaal ne amit ke svabhaav ko kab parakha tha nirmala nahin jaan sakee
nirmala kee aankhen ekaek nam ho aaeen
bolee samajh nahin aa raha kya karoon tum bahut nidar ho
kal kaisa hoga kuchh nahin pata
vah aansoo bahaatee rahee
ek baar pannaalaal ne usakee or dekha aur kaha mujhe itana maaloom hai ki mainne jeevan mein kisee ka bura nahin kiya
eeshvar meree pareeksha le raha hai veena ko duhkh dekar
mera dil patthar ka nahin
lekin meree betee ke saath jo ho raha hai usamen shaayad mere karmon ka koee dosh ho ya phir usake bhaagy mein yahee likha ho
ab yadi doosaree ke lie yahee dar man mein paal lenge to shaayad kahee bhee rishta nahin kar paege
ab aage tumhaaree marjee
pannaalaal yah kahakar doosare kamare mein chale gaye
